entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 8.1°C
Wind: SSW 23 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
